unnormalised: ## Mhojem Vij Bill: Teen Ankamni Eka Thriller (Ani Kiteak Zeros)
normalised: ## Mhaje Electricity Bill: Tin Ankancho Thriller (ani Kiteak Ziro)

unnormalised: Thik, lokanno, dijittal chai stallancher ektthaim zaiat. Aiz ami Bollywood gossipacher vo cricketacher vichitrataicher uloup korchonam. Na, na. Ami sid'de ravtonn ani bhayankor natkak: mhojem vij bill. Natki sangeet.
normalised: Barabor asa, ixttankho, digital chai stallacher ektthaim zatat. Aiz ami novea Bollywood gossipsacher vo cricketachea baariksannecher bhasabhas korunk na. Na, na. Ami khorea kalliz thambovpi drameyant mukhel dive marunk zata: mhojem electricity bill. Natkiyechem git vazav.

unnormalised: Ank I: Aagmon. Hem itlench nirapradh suru zata. Mhojea phonacher ek lhan ping. "Tumchem e-bill ₹7895.25 tayar asa." Mhoji tatkalik prati-kriya? Milde tras. Uprant choryak ullasochi shanka ki hanvem metaverse-ant AC chalu soddlo. Mhaka zai, gambhirtayen? Fattim mhoineahem fakt ₹4500 aslem, ani mhaka khatri asa ki hanvem crypto miner mhonn gupt jeevan apnnailam nam.
normalised: Ank ek: Aagmon. Hem sadepanuch suru zata. Mhojea phonacher ek lhan ping. “Tujem e-bill rupia saat hozar atthshe ani navvad ponchvees point don panch toyar asa.” Mhoji tatkaal pratikria? Lhan traas. Tea uprant mhojer ek dubhav yeto ki hanvem chukon metaverse-ant A-C chalu thevlam. Hanv mazak kortam? Fattlea mhoineak rupia char hozar panchshech aslem, ani mhaka khatri asa ki hanvem crypto miner mhunn gupt jivan apnnavonk na.

unnormalised: Ank II: Vicharop. Hanga vostu gambhir zatat. Hanv ek stakeout-acher detective bhaxen bill bhair kaddtam. Dhuvchea, meter no. 1234567890 tench 15/07/2024-cher vachop, tem vaid dislam. Punn uprant hanv tem polltolem: "Units Vaparle: 987 kWh." Nouxim anim ekyasi?! Tem Uttar Pradeshantlea eka lhan gaoank shakti divpache purem asa! Mhojem fridge ek power station-acher bhagtolem kai?
normalised: Ank don: Chovkoshi. Hi zateli ji thoddi gambhir zata. Hanv bill ek detective-achem stakeout vorvi kadtam. Pori pashan, meter number ek don tin char panch so saat atth nau ziropondradi julay don hozar ani chovisacher vachun te nyaysangat disun yeta. Pun tedna hanv tem polleta: “Units Consumed: nau she ani atthshe ani sattiyasi kilowatt hour.” Nau she ani atthshe ani sattiyasi?! Uttar Pradeshant ek lhan ganvak power korunk hem purn asa! Mhojem fridge ek power station soddun bhaglem?

unnormalised: Doshancho khel suru zata. To mhozo gunho aslo kai? Sambhavit. Hanvem geyser ratbhar chalu soddlo kai? Hoi kai. Hanvem tin phone, ek tablet, anim mhojea padosachea drone-ak ekch velar charge kortana Netflix sodancher polleun 3 AM poriant mhonn kai? Thik, doshi mhonn sangtam. Tari punn, 987 units? Tem electricity board kadlean ek vyakti-vishay dukhp bhaxen dislem.
normalised: Dosaropanaacho khell suru zata. Hi mhoji chuk asli? Sambhavit aslem. Hanvem geyser ratbhar chalu thevlo? Hoi pun hoi. Hanvem tin phon, ek tablet ani mhojea proxichem drone ektthaimch recharge kortana tin A-M poriant Netflix binge-watch kelem? Barabor asa, dosi mhunn sangunk zata. Pun tori astana, nau she ani atthshe ani sattiyasi units? Tem electricity boardakoddlean ek vyaktigat badlo gheunchevorim distalem.

unnormalised: Ank III: Nirakaran (vo ti nasop). Mhojea billacher hath lavn, fattim mhoinea-antlem screenshot (khup chodd unnem), ani ek bori uchit krodhachi matra, hanv customer care hotline-ak phone kortam. Automated menu-nchea ek bhovrandar utar zalea uprant ("Tumchea billavixim-chea takrari-cher press 1 zavn tem kadin zatelam, nirmoll, aniyantrit nirasha khatir 2 press kor...,") Hanv ek nirdhayak manxer votam, timanchi atmik udar zatai.
normalised: Ank tin: Samadhan (vo thodde thodde kamtar). Mhojea billan, fattloea mhoinechea (uchch sankhyenk) amountacho screenshot ani borech dose dharmi krodh gheun, hanv customer care hotlinak fon kortam. Automatic menusanchi bhulbhuleantlean vataun ("Tumchea billavixim dukhkhi aslelea takrari khatir ek dabat, jem kednach soddun yenar na, shuddha, atishay nirash janvche khatir don dabat…"), hanv shevttak ek manvaso sampadvunk pavtam, tanchea aatmeak dhanyvaad dita.

unnormalised: "Baen, tumchem bill ₹7895.25 asa," ti ghoshit karta, vishay-vastav bhaxen. Hanv mhojem durdaiv ujjem kortam, mhaka tumchi bori, chodd polait "Hanv-uchharponn-kortolam-punn-hanv-mhozo-avaz-thoddo-uchch-kortolam" sur lavn. Ti dhiran aikta, uprant mhaka sangta ki tem vachop barobar asa ani pudentlea mhoinea-ant ek samadhan astat mhonn. Ek samadhan? Hanvem hea mhoinea-che bill bhortok mhonn mhji kidney viklya uprant?
normalised: "Ma'am, tumchem bill rupia saat hozar atthshe ani navvad ponchvees point don panch asa," tim vinamrponnan sangtat. Hanv mhoji paristhiti sangta, mhojea boreantlea bore, atishay vinayasheel "Hanv chillaunk na pun hanv nischit rupan mhozo avaz thodo vaddoitat" svarant vaparta. Tim dhiran aikota, uprant mhaka mahiti ditat ki reading barobar asa ani fuddle mhoineak sodhvani asta. Ek sodhvani? Hanvem aplem kidney poilech vikun aplea mhoineachea billachem dudde bhortat?

unnormalised: Tem zait, tumchi thoi asa. Mhojem vij bill saga. Shanka, intrigue, ani arthik nirashachi ek thrillani bhorleli katha. Katechicher ubhi ravtelea divo ani patravanchea aanandacho abraz korpache uttam astelm? Vo, tum zannan, hanv mhojem vij meter koso sarkhem vachoink shikto mhonn soddta. Meter details 220V voltage ani 5A current dakhoitat. Tem problem astait kai?
normalised: Ani mhaka tumchea khatir asa. Mhoje electricity billachi katha. Utkanttha, gutth ani arthik niraxaanchi ek thrill karak katha. Kateak mhoji gozal? Hoi pun hanv candle lightache ani carrier pigeonache aanand apnnavunk pavtam. Vo, tuamk khabar, hanv nimanni rutin mhojem electricity meter koxem vachunk zai tem shiktam. Meteracha vixayank don she ani vis voltacha voltage ani panch ampere-chea current dakhoitat. Hoi pun ti problem asa?

unnormalised: Oh, ani ek khaas shout-out electricity board khatir, tanche gupt algorithms ani tumchi mhojea rito zalea pokettantle poishe kaddpachi achuk samarthya. Hanv tumkhem pranam kortam! (Ek surakshit duryar ravun, vij sambhalltanach.) Kami zait zait GST billacher 18% asa, barobar? Dekhlem zait thodechi modot korta, vo konn kortalam? Pudentlea mhoinea-ant fakt ₹ 6000 zatelam mhonnkai. Konn mhaka khoxaita?
normalised: Oh, ani electricity boardak ek vixex vaddo, tanchea rahasyomy algorithmancher ani tanche kadun dudde kadcheak mhaka aati udar astitv asa. Mhaka aati salute asa! (Surakshit antaracheponan, electricity vachovn). Kamtarbillacher G-S-T atthra percent asa, barabor? Ekech vellen thoddi madad korta, vo karta? Hoi pun fuddle mhoineak rupia so hozar asteli. Koan hanv kidi kortam?
